name: tileFilter
description: A set of filters that is available for the tile service.

args.name: powers
args.description: Determines the powers of the stations that will be included in the tiles. This can be `all` (`powers=all`) for all powers or a list of kWh values for individual powers. For kWh values, you can send a numeric array with the specific powers you would like to return, `powers[]=22&powers[]=43&powers[]=50`.

args.name: powerGroups
args.description: Determines the speed groups of powers that will be included in the tiles. We have grouped all available powers into three speed groups (`slow`, `fast` or `turbo`), you can send an array (`powerGroups[]=slow &powerGroups[]=fast &powerGroups[]=turbo`). Note: You can't mix powerGroups with `powers=all`. You can mix powerGroups with individual powers `powerGroups[]=fast&powers[]=22` (for this specific example we will consider both, stations which are `fast` and stations that are 22 kWh).

children.name: fast
children.description: Fast charging stations (above 43 kWh and below 150 kWh)

args.name: connectors
args.description: Determine the connector standards that will be included in the tiles. You can send an array with the `connectors[]=CHADEMO&connectors[]=IEC_62196_T2_COMBO`, etc.

children.name: CHADEMO
children.description: The connector type is CHAdeMO, DC

children.name: DOMESTIC_F
children.description: Standard/Domestic household, type "F", CEE 7/4, Schuko, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_G
children.description: Standard/Domestic household, type "G", BS 1363, Commonwealth, 3 pins

children.name: IEC_60309_2_single_16
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial Connector single phase 16 amperes (usually blue)

children.name: IEC_60309_2_three_16
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial Connector three phase 16 amperes (usually red)

children.name: IEC_60309_2_three_32
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial Connector three phase 32 amperes (usually red)

children.name: IEC_60309_2_three_64
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial Connector three phase 64 amperes (usually red)

children.name: PANTOGRAPH_BOTTOM_UP
children.description: On-board Bottom-up-Pantograph typically for bus charging

children.name: PANTOGRAPH_TOP_DOWN
children.description: Off-board Top-down-Pantograph typically for bus charging

args.name: amenities
args.description: An optional list of amenities that should be present near the stations. Possible values: `hotel`, `shopping`, `bathroom`, `supermarket`, `playground`, `pharmacy`, `museum`, `coffee`, `park`, `restaurant`.

args.name: availableOnly
args.description: An optional flag that will return only available (`status: free`) stations.

args.name: preferredOperator
args.description: An optional flag that will filter stations by a pre-defined preferred operator.
